revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Year eleven of Aurelius Antoninus Caesar the Lord, Mecheir 11. Sarapion the elder, son of Didymos, has paid to Eudaimon and his associate supervisors of the contracts for farming temple taxes at Tebtunis and associated villages, for public dues of the same year 11, eight drachmas on account, that is, 8 dr. (Date) another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Pharmouthi 1, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Pachon 10, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Payni 28, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Mesore 4, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Year 12, Thoth 4, four drachmas for the past year 11, that is, 4 dr. Phaophi �, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Hathyr, two drachmas, two obols, that is, 2 dr. 2 ob. Year 11, Mecheir 11. Sarapion the elder, weaver, (has paid) for public dues of the same year 11 eight drachmas on account, that is, 8 dr. (Date) another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Pharmouthi 1, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Pachon 10, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Payni 28, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Mesore 4, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Year 12, Thoth 4, four drachmas for the past year 11, that is, 4 dr. Phaophi �, another four drachmas on account, that is, 4 dr. Hathyr, two drachmas, two obols, that is, 2 dr. 2 ob.

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., II.603; SB, XII, no. 10987 Keenan, J.G., and Shelton, J.C. ZPE, v. 7 (1971), p. 180-183.
